name: 鄭一雄
objective: 1.資料表示法：定點系統(Fixed Point System)，浮點系統(Floating Point System)，2.運算工作：定點之加減乘除，快速之運算，浮點運算，3.指令與控制：各種指令介紹，中斷，硬體控制單元設計(Hardwired Control)，微程式控制單元設計(Microprogramming)，4.記憶系統：記憶體之層次(Memory Hierarchy)，虛擬記憶系統(Virtualmemory)，快速記憶(Cache Memory)。5.平行處理(Parallel processing)
schedule:
01. 需要Interface 的理由/IO 指令的格式/Memory mapped and discrete IO
02. DMA and Interrupt IO
03. Handshaking and design FIFO(hardware example)
04. FIFO(IC)
05. Daisy-chain and Vector interrupt controller
06. PIO,SIO, MODEM and DMA controller design
07. Serial communication protocal
08. Memory hierarchy and Searching algorithm
09. 期中考和複習
10. Content addressable memory design
11. Associative memory and Cache memory design
12. Cache write/ Replace aigorithm/ Associate mapped, direct  mapped,and set associate mapped.
13. Virtual memory system and parallel processing
14. Arithmetic pipeline( supercomputer hardware design)
15. Instruction pipeline and its difficulty
16. RISC/CISC/Array processors
17. CrossBar switch and Multistage switching network/Hypercube system
18. 期末考
scorePolicy:
1. 平時成績(含出席狀況): 30%
2. 期中考: 20%
3. 期末考: 50%
